Code preview of table t_s_rolevalue

用户权限表

drop table if exists teleframe.t_s_rolevalue;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: t_s_rolevalue */
/*==============================================================*/
create table teleframe.t_s_rolevalue
(
id int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
role_code char(20) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL,
ruler_code char(20) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL,
ruler_word char(20) CHARACTER SET latin1 DEFAULT 'QUIDV',
tstamp timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
status int(11) DEFAULT '1',
primary key (id)
);
